NAME: Black Future House
DESC: Black Future House is where founders, creators, leaders, and lone wolves come together with one shared ambition: to shape the future. We thought we were creating a house to connect siloed communities, but what transpired felt like more—it genuinely felt like home.

DESC: ​On March 7, between 11am and 2pm, be part of an exclusive guest list featuring leading Web3 and gaming industry investors, and innovative founders. This isn't your typical brunch – it's a close-knit gathering of individuals influencing the trajectory of the gaming space. Enhance your networking experience and indulge in unparalleled insights.

DESC: Get a taste of Israel... venture, innovation, partnerships, networking & more! Would you like to be featured at the TXHQ for Israel? Register via the form with your interest (there are few spots remaining!)

NAME: Founders N' Funders: SXSW VC Reverse Pitch
DESC: Join us as six VCs from across the nation each pitch for five minutes on their investment thesis, preferred industries and regions, check sizes, and more — followed by networking! Curated for pre-seed to Series A founders and active investors. A

NAME: Espacio Latino 2025
DESC: Designed to amplify representation for Latino builders and entrepreneurs, it has evolved into a central hub for driving innovation, fostering collaboration, and connecting the community with valuable resources.

NAME: The Creators Playground
DESC: ​We’re bringing together SXSW’s most talented creators, entrepreneurs, and industry insiders for a day packed with powerful panels, hands-on workshops, interactive games, and high-energy entertainment.

NAME: The Deal Saloon
DESC: The Deal Saloon is an exclusive event during SXSW, designed to bring together the brightest minds shaping the future of clean energy, startups, and investing. This premier gathering will unite industry leaders, trailblazing innovators, and visionary investors for a deep dive into groundbreaking trends and transformative ideas that are reshaping industries and redefining possibilities.

NAME: DivInc Unofficial SXSW Pop Up 2025
DESC: Join us in celebrating International Women's Day for a power-packed panel of CHAMPION athletes from the WNBA. ​These star players turned league executives have fueled decades of growth in the WNBA.

NAME: B2B Marketing Austin Experience
DESC: AppsFactory & BDX Media bring together a select group of founders, entrepreneurs, and industry leaders for a unique networking experience at SXSW.

NAME: CULTURE3 @ SXSW: Brands & Impact In A Post-Trump World
DESC: Oscar nominated film maker, celebrated photographer, chairman of London's biggest Arts centre, the Southbank and Culture3 founder Misan Harriman in conversation with Louis Levin, influence broker and founder of Conspirators

NAME: Work For Higher Austin
DESC: Work for Higher is a mindset. A celebration of the attitude that elevates us in all aspects of life.

NAME: ayana x SXSW 2025 🚀
DESC: The Ayana Foundation is thrilled to host a dynamic event celebrating the vibrant community of entrepreneurs in Austin! Whether you're a seasoned founder, an emerging entrepreneur, or an investor, this event is designed to spark meaningful connections and provide valuable insights.

NAME: FINN Partners X humble ventures: Future of Education Day
DESC: As the demands of the future workforce evolve, schools are recognizing the need to go beyond teaching academic and technical skills by fostering durable skills like adaptability, communication, and critical thinking.

NAME: From Sydney to Austin: EdTech and Innovation
DESC: Join Investment NSW for "From Sydney to Austin: EdTech and Innovation," an opportunity to connect and network with a group of leading NSW EdTech companies during SXSW EDU and SXSW, and learn more about their solutions and what they are doing with partners and customers here in hte US. Join us for this informal event and explore opportunities within Australia's vibrant tech ecosystem.

NAME: Accelerating Innovation Across the Open Social Web
Casa TechMex 2025
DESC: Join us at Casa TechMex, the premier gathering for Mexican entrepreneurs, technologists, and investors! This full-day event showcases the best of Mexico’s innovation ecosystem through engaging panels, networking opportunities, and the TechMex Pitch Competition—where top startups compete for visibility and connections with investors.

NAME: The Open Social Social
DESC: Evening party — refreshments and tunes with your new fedi friends

NAME: Casa TechMex 2025
DESC: Join us at Casa TechMex, the premier gathering for Mexican entrepreneurs, technologists, and investors! This full-day event showcases the best of Mexico’s innovation ecosystem through engaging panels, networking opportunities, and the TechMex Pitch Competition—where top startups compete for visibility and connections with investors.

NAME: Fintech Luminaires
DESC: Fintech Luminaires is our exclusive happy hour that we host at different industry events throughout the year. We are thrilled to be back where it all began: SXSW.

NAME: Creator Economy NYC at SXSW
DESC: ​This special event features an afternoon of activity and connecting, plus an insightful panel of top creators and industry leaders diving into the trends, strategies, and innovations shaping the future of the creator economy.

NAME: London Calling - A New York Times Must Visit Hub in 2025
DESC: An exclusive networking event designed for innovative businesses and investors looking to explore investment opportunities in London and the UK.

NAME: Accelerating Innovation Across the Open Social Web
DESC: Fireside chat with Bluesky CTO Paul Frazee and Flipboard/Surf CEO Mike McCue.  Dot Social Live with David Imel, co-host of Waveform podcast, and Mike McCue

NAME: Developer Meetup
DESC: ​Developer meetup and book signing with ActivityPub co-founder Evan Prodromou

NAME: Brews & Bots @ SXSW '25 (unofficial)
DESC: ​Join us for Brews & Bots @ SXSW '25 (Unofficial) on March 9, 2025, at The Next Practices Group in Austin, TX, hosted by Sightbox. This casual mixer-style event brings together innovators, AI and agent startups, and tech enthusiasts for an afternoon of networking, live demos, and insightful discussions with notable speakers.

NAME: Builders’ Brunch: Connecting Innovators & Investors
DESC: ​Start your SXSW experience with a morning of great connections, delicious brunch bites, and energizing conversations! Whether you're an investor, founder, operator, or simply passionate about building and scaling software companies, this event is the perfect way to fuel your day and connect with others shaping the future of tech.

NAME: AI House @ SXSW - Day 1
DESC: Step into a curated space where top AI startups bring their tech to life with hands-on demos, deep-dive conversations, and connection.

NAME: Going BIG in TEXAS - Slovak House
DESC: Texas is where businesses grow fast, and Slovakia is where world-class ideas and innovations come from. Join us at Slovak House 2025, a high-energy, one-day event designed for entrepreneurs, investors, and professionals eager to expand in Texas - the land of limitless opportunities!

NAME: Early-Stage B2B SaaS Founders & Funders Breakfast Club
DESC: ​We’re bringing together the B2B SaaS community for an exclusive breakfast designed for pre-Series B founders and early-stage investors who are actively building, funding, and scaling the next wave of SaaS innovation. We’re especially committed to supporting underrepresented founders and investors in tech—this is a space for genuine connections, not just another networking event.

NAME: Topgolf Tech Mixer with BairesDev
DESC: Enjoy great company, casual conversations, and a little friendly competition—all in a relaxed and engaging environment. No golf experience? No problem! A Topgolf coach will be on hand during the first hour to help beginners get into the swing of things.

NAME: Evening Party, Presented by 404 Media
DESC: ​Meet the team at 404media.co, a new independent media company founded by tech journalists Jason Koebler, Emanuel Maiberg, Samantha Cole, and Joseph Cox. More details coming soon!

NAME: Crowdstake @ SXSW 2025
DESC: Blockchain Crowdfunding for Film & Games. Designed to unite film producers, game developers, and blockchain enthusiasts.

NAME: Publishers in the Fediverse
DESC: Fireside chat with Cory Doctorow, Journalist and Sci-Fi Author, and Mike McCue

NAME: AI House @ SXSW - Day 2
DESC: ​Step into a curated space where top AI startups bring their tech to life with hands-on demos, deep-dive conversations, and connection.

NAME: AI x Journalism House at SXSW 2025
DESC: Back again in 2025 - the AI x Journalism House at SXSW brought to you by Hacks/Hackers in partnership with the Online News Association. Join us for two days of workshops, speakers and networking alongside the SXSW conference to dive deeper into how artificial intelligence is changing how we create and distribute news and information.

NAME: 2025 SXSW Notion Community Meetup
DESC: Welcome to Austin Notioneers! Our global SXSW Notion community meetup is an incredible time to meet fellow users from around the world, and hear more from enthusiasts and experts on ways you can maximize the tool.

NAME: TEXAS EMBASSY: Health & Human Performance
DESC: ​Q-Branch is excited to announce the "Texas Embassy." Join us on March 10th, for the 1st annual Texas Embassy Event as we showcase the latest innovations in health and human performance!

NAME: The New Playbook
DESC: “From Walled Gardens to the Open Social Web: The Next Evolution of Brand Storytelling”

NAME: TEXAS EMBASSY: Health & Human Performance
DESC: ​Q-Branch is excited to announce the "Texas Embassy." Join us on March 10th, for the 1st annual Texas Embassy Event as we showcase the latest innovations in health and human performance!

NAME: AI for Women
DESC: Join us for an exclusive morning of panels, networking, and brunch at SXSW 2025, where we explore how AI is reshaping the future of women's wellness, healthcare, and entrepreneurship.

NAME: Duetti House in Austin
DESC: You'll hang with the Duetti team, relax in style, and even capture some content for socials. Once you RSVP we’ll follow up to lock in a day that works best for you.

NAME: VC Fund of Funds launch announcement
DESC: 7BC Global VC Demo Day & VC Fund of Funds launch announcement & Austin Boomtown VC Insight Panel

NAME: SXSW Rooftop Tech Mixer
DESC: Join us for a private invite-only Founders Night hosted by Entre and Fidelity.  Click the link to request to join.

NAME: NachoTuesday: SaaS & AI Founder + Investor Happy Hour
DESC: This exclusive Founder + Investor happy hour event alongside key high-profile brands and VC firms.

NAME: The Future of Middleware: Bridging the Gap to Modernization
DESC: Join us during SXSW for an exclusive evening of thought-provoking conversation and networking focused on the transformative role of middleware in today’s technology landscape. We’ll explore how middleware is shaping the future of application development, cloud infrastructure, and the delivery of professional services.

NAME: Batter Up! Austin - A Live Pitch Event
DESC: March 11, we're hosting a live pitch event for founders. And it's FREE to attend.

NAME: Berlin Flat — SXSW Edition
DESC: Berlin is a city that thrives on collaboration, and Berlin Flat is where global minds come together to shape the future. From groundbreaking startups to creative pioneers, we’re continuing to build a space where ideas spark, and partnerships are born.

NAME: Austin Digital Social Networking Mixer During SXSW
DESC: Hosted by Sean Kelly, host of The Digital Social Hour Podcast, this event brings together some of the most influential and established individuals to connect, share ideas, and form valuable partnerships and friendships.

NAME: 3rd Annual SXSW Happy Hour
DESC: Scout Ventures, Context Ventures, & The Military Veteran are hosting a happy hour at SXSW to discuss military veteran topics, startups, and our community. Join us to connect with veterans local to Austin and those visiting SXSW!

NAME: Beyond Productivity: AI and the Future of Work
DESC: Join Glean, Codeium, and WWT for an exclusive evening at Electric Shuffle in Austin at SXSW, where industry leaders will explore the next phase of Agentic AI—moving beyond productivity to true intelligence and automation.

NAME: The International House
DESC: Join us for the highly anticipated return of the International House, hosted by IA during SXSW! This annual event has become a cornerstone of innovation and global entrepreneurship, bringing together founders, investors, and industry leaders from across the world!

NAME: Climate Round Up: Innovation Showcase 2025
DESC: We’re back with the 2025 edition of the best climate tech event of SXSW. Join us to meet the visionary founders and investors shaping our planet’s future and learn about what’s next in climate tech.

Austin is the place to be for game-changers, big thinkers, and those who thrive on next-level conversations. If you’re a fan of All-In, Modern Wisdom, and My First Million, this is your chance to meet your tribe IRL.
